episode_summary: This episode of 'No Such Thing As A Fish' features discussions on the history and uses of pencils, the effects of alcohol on attractiveness, the challenges of growing giant vegetables, and the unique defense mechanisms of the beaded lacewing insect.

facts.fact: The first ever pencils were used to draw on sheep.
Drinking alcohol makes you more attractive.
The National Giant Vegetable Championships had to move venue in the mid-80s as the pumpkins started getting too big to fit through the doors.
The beaded lacewing insect incapacitates its prey by farting on it.
